Location.name: Location
Location.description: Describes where an uncertainty manifests itself within the architecture.
Location.exampleText: The system environment is outside of the system structure. Within the system structure resides the system behaviour. The system behaviour is influenced by the input.

ArchitecturalElementType.name: Architectural Element Type
ArchitecturalElementType.description: Elements to which an uncertainty can be assigned.

Type.name: Type
Type.description: How much is known about the uncertainty and how can it be described.
Type.exampleText: When there is recognized ignorance, one does not have any knowledge of the uncertainty. When there is scenario uncertainty, one knows the possible outcomes of the uncertainty. When there is statistical uncertainty, one knows the probability distribution of the uncertainty.

Manageability.name: Manageability
Manageability.description: Can more knowledge or appropriate means reduce the uncertainty.

ResolutionTime.name: Resolution Time
ResolutionTime.description: Time at which the uncertainty is expected to be fully resolved.

ReducibleByADD.name: Reducible by ADD
ReducibleByADD.description: Uncertainty resolvable by an architectural design decision.

SeverityOfTheImpact.name: Severity of the Impact
SeverityOfTheImpact.description: Describes the severity if uncertainty is not mitigated.
